```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)

csv_files <- list.files("histogram-data", pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = TRUE)

pdf("all_histograms.pdf", width = 6, height = 4)
for (file in csv_files) {
  data <- read_csv(file, col_names = FALSE, show_col_types = FALSE)
  data$X1 <- as.numeric(data$X1)  # ensure numeric for proper binning

  suppressWarnings(
    ggplot(data, aes(x = X1)) +
      geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "grey", color = "white", boundary = 0.5) +
      scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(data$X1), max(data$X1), by = 1)) +
      labs(x = "Value", y = "Frequency", title = basename(file)) +
      theme_minimal() -> p
  )

  print(p)
}
dev.off()
